entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING , Saugeen Shores
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:56 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snowshower, -4.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wiarton Airport 6:00 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
Condition: Light Snowshower
Temperature: -4.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa rising
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 74 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -8.1°C
Wind: W 30 km/h gust 49 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries or snow squalls. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries and snow squalls. Blowing snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Flurries. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
